text:
Eugenio Derbez (born Eugenio González Derbez; September 2, 1961 in Mexico City, Mexico) is an Mexican television actor. He created the television series of "XHDRBZ", "Vecinos", and "La familia P. Luche". Derbez is also a Formula Three Auto racing driver. In 2013, Derbez made his director debut in the comedy-drama movie "Instructions Not Included".
Derbez also starred in American comedies such as "How to Be a Latin Lover" (2017), "Overboard" (2018) and "The Nutcracker and the Four Realms" (2018).

annotations.surface_form: How to Be a Latin Lover
The Nutcracker and the Four Realms
